articles.title: US to grow at double the rate of G7 peers this year, says IMF - Financial Times
articles.description: Fund also upgrades inflation forecasts as strong demand and tight labour market delay possible Fed rate cuts

articles.author: Al Jazeera
articles.title: Tesla to lay off more than 10 percent of staff worldwide amid falling sales - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: CEO Elon Musk says in memo that job cuts will leave firm ‘lean, innovative and hungry for the next growth phase cycle’.
articles.content:
Electric carmaker Tesla plans to lay off more than 10 percent of its global workforce, according to a memo sent to employees by CEO Elon Musk.
Musk told staff in an email on Monday that the cuts wer… [+2302 chars]
